title: {Diamond 5+} Axenic eSports competitive OOL team looking to make OCS
body:
Axenic eSports is a new competitive esports organization looking to compete for OCS in the second split of OOL 2017.
Looking for players who are diamond and higher but will accept applications if just below the barline.
If you're motivated to improve as a player and are looking for a chance to play pro then please apply to the form attached.

Teams will be finalised by the 25th of March 2017
